tweakmyclient.config.generic.daylightOve: The time set when overriding the client's world time.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.openConfigG: A hotkey to open the in-game Config GUI.
tweakmyclient.config.disable_toggle.disa: disableClientEntityTNTUpdates

Disables TNT entity updates on the client.
Maybe useful for TNT related machines.
disableClientEntityWitherUpdates

Disables wither entity updates on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.
disableClientEntityZombieVillagerUpdates

Disables zombie villager entity updates on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.
disableEntityTNTRendering

Disables TNT entity rendering.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.
disableEntityWitherRendering

Disables wither entity rendering.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.
disableEntityZombieVillagerRendering

Disables zombie villager entity rendering.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.
disableRenderOverlayFire

Disables fire overlay rendering when player is on fire.
You will gain a broader view.
disableRenderOverlayPumpkin

Disables mask overlay rendering when player is wearing pumpkin.
You will gain a broader view.
disableScoreboardRendering

Disables Scoreboard rendering.
You will gain a broader view.
disableSlowdown
Cancels slowness effects caused by honey, soul sand and using items.
tweakmyclient.config.feature_toggle.feat: Automatically respawns you whenever you die.
Override the client's world time to the day time you want.
